member.name: T:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcError
member.summary: Represents RPC error information.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The number that indicates the error type that occurred.
The string providing a short description of the error. The message should be limited to a single concise sentence.
The primitive or structured value that contains additional information about the error.

member.name: M:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcError.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The number that indicates the error type that occurred.
The string providing a short description of the error. The message should be limited to a single concise sentence.

member.summary: Gets a number that indicates the error type that occurred.

member.summary: Gets a string providing a short description of the error.

member.name: P:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcError.Data
member.summary: Gets an optional value that contains additional information about the error.

member.name: P:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcError.HasData
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the message has additional information specified.

member.name: T:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes
member.summary: Defines standard RPC error codes and error codes ranges.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.InvalidJson
member.summary: The error code which specifies, that the provided JSON is invalid.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.InvalidOperation
member.summary: The error code which specifies, that an error occurred during processing the message.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.InvalidParameters
member.summary: The error code which specifies, that the specified method parameters are invalid.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.InvalidMethod
member.summary: The error code which specifies, that the specified method does not exist or is not available.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.InvalidMessage
member.summary: The error code which specifies, that the provided message is not valid.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.ServerErrorsLowerBoundary
member.summary: The lower boundary of the implementation-defined server error codes range.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.ServerErrorsUpperBoundary
member.summary: The upper boundary of the implementation-defined server error codes range.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.StandardErrorsLowerBoundary
member.summary: The lower boundary of the standard error codes range.

member.name: F:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcErrorCodes.StandardErrorsUpperBoundary
member.summary: The upper boundary of the standard error codes range.

member.name: T:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcSerializer
member.summary: Serializes and deserializes JSON-RPC messages into and from the JSON format.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The request contracts.
The response contracts.
The static response bindings.
The dynamic response bindings.

member.name: M:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcSerializer.DeserializeRequestData(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified JSON string to request data.
member.param: The JSON string to deserialize.
member.returns: RPC information about requests.
member.exception: An error occurred during request(s) deserialization.

member.name: M:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcSerializer.DeserializeRequestData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified stream with a JSON string to request data.
member.param: The stream with a JSON string to deserialize.
member.returns: RPC information about requests.
member.exception: An error occurred during request(s) deserialization.

member.name: M:System.Data.JsonRpc.JsonRpcSerializer.DeserializeRequestDataAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified stream with a JSON string to request data as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The stream with a JSON string to deserialize.
The cancellation token for canceling the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is RPC information about requests.
member.exception: An error occurred during request(s) deserialization.

member.summary: Deserializes the specified JSON string to response data.
